```{r setup, include = FALSE, cache = FALSE}
library(conflicted)
library(rio)
library(mapview)
library(crosstable)
library(plotly)
conflict_prefer("layout", "plotly")
library(reactablefmtr)
library(DALEX)
library(patchwork)
library(boxr)
box_auth()
```
